column3: Latest;Phnom Penh:------ Until the afternoon of February 25
column5: by the authority of Phnom Penh Police Commissioner
column6: more than 200 people were allowed to return home out of 312 people
column8: who were arrested after a raid in Rock Entertainment Center.------After being tested for drug abuse
column9: the released revelers signed contracts with police agreeing to cease taking drugs in the future.------According to sources
column10: 54 people are still detained after around 50kg of drugs and a gun was seized during the raid.
